name: Inuit Fishing
description:
A small game made in a few weeks !

Please leave a review and share if you enjoy it !

Directed by Nym (Léo Marambat-Patinote) and Permilias (Martin Jacob)

CONTROLS

F, G and H to switch hook color.

Up and Down to move your hook.

Catch all the fishes !

All sounds found on Zapsplat.com - Free downloadable sounds !

Music licensed under Creative Commons.
